column2: Form Iberia Militarily

We have suceeded in beating back the Aragonese off the Iberian peninsula, now the time has come to create one Empire that rules all of Hispania. But the question remains: Will the Catalans accept our rule?
Declare a Government in Exile
The situation in both Italy, Iberia & Europe as a whole has become untennable for us, perhaps it's for the best to seek refuge in The New World to bide our time for future opportunities.
Declare a Government in Exile
The Dream of a Unified Iberia lies shattered, the Peninsula now overrun by foreign powers
column3: The time has come to establish a new Government in Cuba in-order to gather strength for a return to rightful Spanish dominion in Iberia.

column2: Reclaim Illyria
What was once part of the Republic is now ours again, time time has come to end the failed experiment that is a independent Illyria.
Proclaim Dominion over the Adriatic
With our lands in Greece connected the entire coastline along the Adriatic is now ours it is time to bring our Most Serene Republic to even greater heights.
Declare Stewardship over Italy

For centuries the squabbling City-States of Italy have bickered even as foreign nations & peoples enroached the peninsula, it is perhaps for the best that Venice sherpad these states for their own good.
Declare a Government in Exile

Venice is lost, the Most Serene Republic that lasted a thousand years is now under foreign occupation, the true peoples of Venetia will carry on with a revitalized Government in Athesia until the time is ripe for revenge.
Proclaim the Grand Duchy of Romania
With the Romanian peoples united under our singular Banner it is time to offically claim dejure rulership over Romania.
Annexation of Crimea
The Peoples of Crimea deserve true self-determination under the rightful guidance of The Commonwealth, we merely took steps to ensure this.
The Empire of the North Sea
Now that Ireland has been wrestled away from Anglois dominion we now finally have compelete imperium over the North Sea.
Annex the Principalities
Although we have not yet been able to form the Elbian Confederation in the north, the principalities surrounding Bohemia to the west & south shall soon thrive under centralized Imperial management.
Great Leap Forward
This decision is mandatory to take in multiplayer.
Great Leap Forward
This decision is mandatory to take in multiplayer.
Unite the home penisula
The house of Rom has been victorious in Italy! However to our west lies the spanish meance, perhaps it is time for us to unite the 2 penisulas. Maybe we can even unite the latin world....
All of Arcadia
Those ameriganan fuckers will surpass us soon if we dont secure this continent! Forwards for all of mexico!
The north Awakens
It is time for the north to awaken. Long ago our ancestors ruled over those lands and we shall reclaim them.
The sword of islam
Foreigners have landed on the shores of north africa and taken rightful arab land! We must liberate our brothers and strike at the latin threat.
Destiny of the East
If we are to survive in this turbulent world we must, like be nice to our subjects or something.
Nanshin ron

The south is full of valuable resources. Our japanese subjects wish to conquer it in order to put a fair distance between them and the europeans.TENNO HEIKA BANZAI!!!!!(NOTE PLEASE ONLY TAKE CORE TERRITORY AND NOTHING MORE SINCE I DONT KNOW HOW TO MAKE SINGLE PROVNINCES CEDE TO A NATION)
Nanshin ron
The north is full of valuable resources. Our korea subjects wish to conquer it in order to put a fair distance between them and the europeans.TENGO PYEHA MANSE!!!!!
Secure the Near-East
With Persia finally united under our rule the time has come to reclaims Timurs legacy, beginning with our eastern neighbors.
Subjugate the Khaganates
The Khaganates has once again be put under rightful Persian leadership, though this is now a likely point of contention with Russia.
Change Mining RGO
Allows the switching of a single RGO province of the following types: Coal, Iron, Sulphur, Precious Goods, or Precious Metal into Coal, Iron, or Sulphur. Causes a cooldown of 25 years.
Change Agriculture RGO

Allows the switching of a single RGO province of the following types: Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, Timber, Silk, Dye, Opium, Tea, Tobacco, or Coffee into Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, or Timber. Causes a cool down of 12.5 years.
Integrate Lombardia
Lombardia has been under Venetian influence for some-time now, the time has come to officaly integrate the Duchy into the Most Serene Republic.
Reclaim the Colony of Vinland
Although lost to separatists in 1808 during The Great German war, perhaps it is now time to revitalize our ambitions in the Americas & reclaim our lost colony.
Lay claim to the Old Motherland
With the Scandinavians once more repulsed from the Continent the time has come to take the fight to unite Arcadia with the greatest of it's forebearing nations.
Lay claim to Scandinavia's Colonies
With the Scandinavians once more from repulsed the Continent the time has come to lay claim to their American colonies.
Reclaim the Colony of New Burgundy
Although offically lost to separatists in 1805 during The Great German war, perhaps it is now time to revitalize our ambitions in the Americas & reclaim our lost colony.
Lay claim to the Old Motherland
With the Burgundians once more repulsed from the Continent the time has come to take the fight to unite Arcadia with the greatest of it's forebearing nations.
Lay claim to Burgundian Colonies
With the Burgundians once more repulsed from the Continent the time has come to lay claim to their American colonies.
Reclaim the Crown Colony of Plantagenia

Lost due to Charles I Plantagenet being granted the newly christened Kingdom of Plantagenia in 1771 with the Treaty of Brest after his failed invasion of France to claim the dual-monarchy in 1770. It is now a new Era, and the time has come to disavow old treaties and bring the awry colony back into the fold.
Proclaim the Triple-Monarchy

When Charles I Plantagenet was granted the independent Kingdom of Plantagenia in 1771 with the Treaty of Brest the Crown of Plantegia was seperated from the Dual-Monarchy, however with a failed resurgent Anglois attempt at colonialism in the Americas it is perhaps time to attempt to claim rulership over the Dual-Monarchy once more.
Take the fight to the Anglois
The Plantagenian nationalists of Arcadia are pushing for a re-enactment of Charles I Plantagent's invasion of France, perhaps a landing at Brittany wouldn't be remiss?
Reclaim the Crown Colony of Plantagenia

Lost due to Charles I Plantagenet being granted the newly christened Kingdom of Plantagenia in 1771 with the Treaty of Brest after his failed invasion of France to claim the Kingdom in 1770. It is now a new Era, and the time has come to disavow old treaties and bring the awry colony back into the fold.
Claim the Old Kingdom

When Charles I Plantagenet was granted the independent Kingdom of Plantagenia in 1771 with the Treaty of Brest the Crown of Plantegia was seperated from the Kingdom of France, however with a failed resurgent French attempt at colonialism in the Americas it is perhaps time to attempt to claim rulership over the old Kingdom.
Plan our Vengence against the French
The Plantagenian nationalists of Arcadia are pushing for a re-enactment of Charles I Plantagent's invasion of France, perhaps a naval landing at Brittany wouldn't be remiss?
Reclaim the former Viceroyalty of Granada
The time has come to reassert Spanish-dominion over the New World, starting with the old Viceroyalty of Granada.
End Spanish Sovereignty
With the Spanish expelled once more from their former holdings it has become apparent that this is a struggle of survival, we must instead bring the war to old homeland.
Centralize Rule Over the Kingdom of Lithuania

Lithuania has long been a integral part of The Commonwealth, however the time has come to take steps to end the doctrine of decentralized autonomous rule & work towards the creation of a single true central government.
Fully Integrate Granada
We must bring centralized Federal rule to the former Viceroyalty of Granada.
Expand South into Gran Colombia
The lands to our south are no longer protected by their European overlords, this presents new opportunities.
A Greater Incan Empire
A new golden age dawns for the true rulers of Ameriga, we must strive to ever greater heights least we are once again confined by foriegners enroaching from all directions.
Remove the Incans

With the rest of the continent under our firm control, the last bastion of independence against a truly unified Ameriga lays with the native population of the Incan Empire, they shall be incorporated for the greater good.
Consolidate Rule of Egypt
With Egypt finally conquered it is time to establish proper rule in the area, and work to integrate it into the Greater Ethopian state.
Greater Ethopia
Ethopia grows ever larger, perhaps even one day to encompass the entirety of Africa, for now East-Africa will have to do.
Ethopian Arabia
A new empire rises centered on the people of Ethopia, and Arabia is merely a stepping stone for future glory.
Resolve the Anglois Dilemma

This decision enables the opportunity to get additional accepted pops accepted in time, the detriment however is it also allows the possibility of a civil war, or even the possibily of being reduced to playing as France or England if you have lost significant holdings on either side of the strait.
Reset Province Selector
Destroys the province selector building in all provinces.
Stop The Open Door Policy
The 'Open Door' policy has brought a economic burden to our country, perhaps it's time to rescind our immigration incentives.
Pass the Act of Union

Uniting the Kingdoms of England, Wales, Scotland and Ireland is the final step in our campaign of forging the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland. Thanks to our position, we are protected by seas in every direction. Perhaps, if we create something like the Royal Navy, we will be able to maintain naval supremacy and dominate the oceans. Now we can finally sing our new anthem - Rule, Britannia!
Construct Italy
With the void of Aragonese influence in Italy we have gained a very good opportunities to fill the power vacuum in Italy through helping the Grand Duchy of Savoy to gain the Iron Crown.
Announce our interest in Italia
With the final defeat of the House of Valois, we have gained enough  space to influence Italy.
Integrate Bretons
While Bretons were not an integral part of the Capetian kingdom we have expelled the usurpers from this land nonetheless. We have a tradition of multiculturalism so it's normal to accept them too
Form the Franche-Comte
The French claim on the Free County of Burgundy is solid. Though we had to project our power through force, we can claim the ethernal right to these lands.
Pacify the Irish
It is time to solidify control of the Isle in the hands of the English once and for all.
Integrate Novgorod

We can finish enforcing our hegemony over the Baltic by giving special consideration to the needs of the Novgorodian people. By doing so, we will create a strong and loyal buffer against any Scandinavian revanchism.
The Integration of Kurland

The last obstacle to our domination of the Baltic sea is the small state of Kourland. For too long, we have let them pursue a semi-independent policy and it is now time to renew their full integration into our nation.
Integrate Pskov
We the solidification of our rule over the puppet government of Pskov and work actively to ensure it is properly integrated into the Scandinavian Union.
Russian Imperial Ambitions

If Russia is to become a great empire, we must determine how we are to deal with our strong neighbors.






The effects of the focuses are as follows:

Panslavism: Cores on Orsha, Chernigov, and Luhansk. Decision to move capital to Rostov, able to accept Ruthenian with 1900 tech if Russia is formed.

The Baltics: Cores on Estonia, Latvia, and Pskov.. Decision to move capital to St.Petersburg, Estonian & Lativan accepted with 1870 tech, Novgorodian with 1870 tech.

Southern: Cores on the Astrakhan Khanate & Circassia. Astrakhan accepted with 1870 tech.

Siberian: Cores on Nogai & Sibir, and Western Siberia. Tartars accepted with 1870 tech.
General Inital Setup.
Gives Countries their inital starting money & stockpile, trigget liferating & literacy rebalancing events.
Setup for Without Dual Monarchy.
Gives England & France their literacy changes as-well as the 10% starting pop nerf.
